code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{API_URL}from'../../config';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function AuthenticationForm(){const[name,setName]=useState();const[password,setPassword]=useState();const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();const authorization=await fetch("".concat(API_URL,"/login_view/"),{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({name,password})});if(authorization.ok){window.location.href='http://localhost:3000/trainingCompass/';}else{alert('не верный логин или пароль');setName('');setPassword('');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{className:"form",onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value),className:"text-style",placeholder:"Имя",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value),className:"text-style",placeholder:"Пороль",required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"block-button",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",className:"btn",children:"\u0412\u0445\u043E\u0434"})})]});}
